trans-unit.source: Provides core services of the Microsoft Annotations Framework to manage and display user annotations.
The following example shows how to create and start an <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何创建并启动<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService>。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService" /> class for use with a specified document viewing control.
The <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService> can be used with the following document viewing controls:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService>可以用于查看控件的以下文档：

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase> derived subclasses
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase> 派生的子类

trans-unit.source: The following example shows use of the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示使用<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.%23ctor%2A>构造函数。

trans-unit.source: The document reading control associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService" />.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService" /> class for use with a specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader" /> control.
The following example shows use of the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示使用<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.%23ctor%2A>构造函数。

trans-unit.source: The document viewing control associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService" />.

Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService" /> class for use with a specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer" /> control.
The following example shows use of the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示使用<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.%23ctor%2A>构造函数。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="viewer" /> is <see langword="null" />.
The document viewing control associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService" />.

Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService" /> class for use with a specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer" /> or <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer" /> control.
This constructor can be used with <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase> derived controls:
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数可与<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase>派生控件：

trans-unit.source: The following example shows use of the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示使用<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.%23ctor%2A>构造函数。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="viewer" /> is <see langword="null" />.
Represents the command to clear highlight annotations from the current selection.
The following example shows how to assign routed commands to menu items in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-titlexaml-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何将路由的命令分配中的菜单项[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-titlexaml-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: Represents the command to create a highlight annotation on the current selection.
The following example shows how to assign routed commands to menu items in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-titlexaml-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何将路由的命令分配中的菜单项[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-titlexaml-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: Represents the command to create an ink-note annotation on the current selection.
The following example shows how routed commands are assigned to menu items in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-titlexaml-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何将路由的命令中的菜单项分配[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-titlexaml-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: Represents the command to create a text-note annotation on the current selection.
The following example shows how routed commands are assigned to menu items in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-titlexaml-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何将路由的命令中的菜单项分配[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-titlexaml-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: Represents the command to delete all ink-note, text-note, and highlight annotations in the current selection.
The following example shows how to assign routed commands to menu items in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-titlexaml-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何将路由的命令分配中的菜单项[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-titlexaml-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: Represents the command to delete all ink-note and text-note annotations in the current selection.
The following example shows how routed commands are assigned to menu items in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-titlexaml-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何将路由的命令中的菜单项分配[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-titlexaml-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: Disables annotations processing and hides all visible annotations.
When <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.Disable%2A> is called all annotations become hidden.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.Disable%2A>称为所有批注变为隐藏。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.Disable%2A> method when you stop the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.Disable%2A>方法停止时<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService>。

trans-unit.source: The annotation store to use for reading, writing, and displaying annotations.

Enables the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService" /> for use with a given <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore" /> and displays all visible annotations.
When <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.Enable%2A> is called all annotations in the viewer control window are displayed.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.Enable%2A>称为所有显示在查看器控件窗口中的批注。

trans-unit.source: (The viewer control associated with the annotation service is specified in the parameter to the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.%23ctor%2A> constructor.)
trans-unit.target: (与批注服务关联的查看器控件中的参数指定<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.%23ctor%2A>构造函数。)

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.Enable%2A> method when you start an <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.Enable%2A>方法启动时<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService>。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="annotationStore" /> is <see langword="null" />.
Returns the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService" /> associated with a specified document viewing control.

The <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.GetService%2A> method can be used to return the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService> associated with the following document viewing controls:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.GetService%2A>方法可以用于返回<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService>与下面的文档查看控件相关联：

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase> derived subclasses
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase> 派生的子类

trans-unit.source: The viewer control associated with the annotation service is specified in the parameter to the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 中的参数指定与批注服务关联的查看器控件<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.%23ctor%2A>构造函数。

trans-unit.source: The document reader control to return the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService" /> instance for.
Returns the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService" /> associated with a specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader" />.

The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService" /> associated with the given document reader control; or <see langword="null" /> if the specified document reader has no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService" />.

The <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.GetService%2A> method can be used to return the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService> associated with the following document viewing controls:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.GetService%2A>方法可以用于返回<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService>与下面的文档查看控件相关联：

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase> 派生的子类

Returns the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService" /> associated with a specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer" />.

The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService" /> associated with the given document viewer control; or <see langword="null" /> if the specified viewer control has no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService" />.

The <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.GetService%2A> method can be used to return the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService> associated with the following document viewing controls:

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase> 派生的子类

trans-unit.source: The viewer control associated with the annotation service is specified in the parameter to the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 中的参数指定与批注服务关联的查看器控件<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.%23ctor%2A>构造函数。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="viewer" /> is <see langword="null" />.
The document viewing control to return the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService" /> instance for.
Returns the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService" /> instance associated with a specified document viewing control.

The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService" /> associated with the given document viewing control; or <see langword="null" /> if the specified document viewing control has no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService" />.

The <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.GetService%2A> method can be used to return the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService> associated with the following document viewing controls:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.GetService%2A>方法可以用于返回<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService>与下面的文档查看控件相关联：

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase> derived subclasses
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase> 派生的子类

trans-unit.source: The viewer control associated with the annotation service is specified in the parameter to the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 中的参数指定与批注服务关联的查看器控件<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.%23ctor%2A>构造函数。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="viewer" /> is <see langword="null" />.
Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService" /> is enabled.
<see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService" /> is enabled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果启用 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService" />，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.IsEnabled%2A> property when you create and start an <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.IsEnabled%2A>属性时创建并启动<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService>。

trans-unit.source: Also if the user chooses to open a new document in the viewer control, the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService> must be disabled for the old document and then enabled for the new document.
trans-unit.target: 此外如果用户选择在查看器控件中，打开一个新文档<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService>必须禁用旧的文档，然后启用为新文档。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore" /> used by this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService" />.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore" /> used by this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService" />.
trans-unit.target: 此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore" /> 使用的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore> used by the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService> is specified as a parameter in the service's <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.Enable%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore>由<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService>指定为该服务中的参数<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.Enable%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.Store%2A> property when you start and stop an <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.Store%2A>当你启动和停止时，属性<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService>。
